title: When do low levels get their champion rotation?
body: I started to smurf on the Japan server and started a new account but somehow I am level 10 and still don't have the free champion rotation. I have done some research and googled about it and mostly people respond by saying at level 6. But I am level 10 already.

replies.body:
The *New Player Champion Rotation* ends after level 6. From then on, you'll only have access to the regular champion rotation. You can find more about this in our [**FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752864-Choosing-the-Right-Champion#h2q3).

Let me know if you have any other questions.

but like im lvl 8 and still have beginner rotation...
{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
